price: (20) This [Qur’ān] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith].
arabic: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: hādhā baṣāiru lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmin yūqinūna
